582c40aa159efa0fa5b72d23f2d24671e9776fef.commit.message:
Added support for setting a Synchronizer to BasicBuilderParameters.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1485393 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
582c40aa159efa0fa5b72d23f2d24671e9776fef.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

d3891e97c46ef133be3b3d2d9c3a272c6526910d.commit.message:
Reworked CombinedConfiguration regarding thread-safety.

The Synchronizer object is now exclusively used to protect an instance against
concurrent access. This is a change of behavior because previously there was
always some kind of synchronization; now this is configurable. Therefore,
currently some tests for multi-threaded access are failing and have been
disabled.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1485392 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
d3891e97c46ef133be3b3d2d9c3a272c6526910d.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

a0b8f48fe6eeb4d03cf2ad069c2a518c3279dce4.commit.message:
Don't call non-private, non-final methods from the constructor.

835629765d1c6297f6cb5dc6d350cce1cfbfab7d.commit.message:
Removed some stuff related to the old reloading mechanism.

CombinedConfiguration used to support a flag for triggering reloads on child
configurations. If set, on each property access all child configurations are
queried to initiate a reload if necessary. Reloading is now handled in a
different way; therefore, this mechanism could be removed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1485387 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
835629765d1c6297f6cb5dc6d350cce1cfbfab7d.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

9f5468faecbe356c7c85bac7d987f8f4b9185d97.commit.message:
Reworked CompositeConfiguration regarding thread-safety.

The methods for accessing the list of child configurations and the in-memory
configuration now call the Synchronizer correctly. Updated Javadoc regarding
thread-safety.

ad356da0f6b10e4ab32c575f85b719d184ba32cc.commit.message:
Reworked PropertiesConfiguration regarding thread-safety.

Some special methods of PropertiesConfiguration now call the Synchronizer
correctly. Removed synchronization from properties set via the builder.
Updated Javadoc regarding thread-safety.

fb2cb222c5aa1bbc51882a79fba752b8008efecc.commit.message:
FileHandler now takes care for synchronization.

If the associated FileBased object implements the SynchronizerSupport
interface, the object is locked during load and save operations.
